<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage100"></A>
<A NAME="EXH1027SEVERANCEAGREEMENT_HTM_SBD25BE0FB92C44BBB2111F13CF9B8DCA">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	Waiver (in accordance with Section 4(g) herein)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	by the deadline specified therein, Executive will be required to reimburse SHO for the portion of the cost for the benefits referred to under Section 1(a)(ii)(l) immediately above paid by SHO during the Salary Continuation Period, and Executive will instead be eligible for COBRA coverage under the SHO medical, dental, and vision plans as of the Date of Termination. Executive will be responsible for the full cost of COBRA premiums if this Section 1(a)(ii)(2) is applicable.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	Subject to Section 1(a)(ii)(4) immediately below, if Executive provides services to another employer and is covered by such employer&#8217;s health benefits plan or program, the medical and dental benefits provided by SHO hereunder will be secondary to such employer&#8217;s health benefits plan or program in accordance with the terms of the SHO health benefit plans.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	All of the benefits described in this Section 1(a)(ii) will terminate,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	and any entitlements to future such payments will be forfeited,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	&#32;if Executive is employed by a SHO Competitor or a SHO Vendor during the Salary Continuation Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	(which for purposes of this Section 1(a)(ii)(4) will not exceed _________ months)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	or in the event of Executive&#8217;s breach of this Agreement (in accordance with Section 10 below). In either case, Executive will be required to reimburse SHO for any portion of the cost for the benefits referred to under Section 1(a)(ii)(1) immediately above paid by SHO during the Salary Continuation Period, and Executive will instead be eligible for COBRA continuation coverage under the SHO medical, dental, and vision plans as of Executive&#8217;s Severance from Service date. Executive will be responsible for the full cost of COBRA premiums if this Section 1(a)(ii)(4) is applicable.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:36PX;">
	iii.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	In addition to the foregoing Severance Benefits, a lump sum payment will be made to Executive not later than Executive&#8217;s next regular salary payroll date following the Date of Termination in an amount equal to the sum of any base salary and any vacation benefits that have accrued through the Date of Termination but only to the extent not already paid. No vacation will accrue during the Salary Continuation Period. No payment will be made with respect to unused &#8220;personal&#8221; days. Notwithstanding the foregoing and anything herein to the contrary, in the event of Executive&#8217;s death during the Salary Continuation Period, any unpaid portion of the Salary Continuation Amount payable in accordance with Section 1(a)(i) above will be paid in a lump sum, within sixty (60) days of death (and no later than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3B3B3B;">
	amounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	would have b
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	een paid absent death), to Executive&#8217;s estate, and any eligible dependents who are covered dependents as of the date of death will experience a qualifying event under COBRA as a result of such death.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:144PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	iv.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Impact of Termination on Certain Other Plans/Programs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Annual Incentive Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	. Upon the Date of Termination, Executive&#8217;s entitlement to any award under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	SHO&#8217;s Annual Incentive Plan (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AIP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	&#32;or other applicable annual incentive plan sponsored by SHO will be determined in accordance with the terms and conditions of the AIP or other plan document regarding termination of employment.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Long-Term Incentive Program
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	. Upon the Date of Termination, Executive&#8217;s entitlement to any award granted to Executive under SHO&#8217;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Long-Term Incentive Program (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	LTIP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	&#32;or other applicable long-term incentive program sponsored by SHO will be determined in accordance with the terms and conditions of the applicable award letter and the LTIP or other plan document regarding termination of employment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:13PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:144PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Stock Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	. Upon the Date of Termination, Executive&#8217;s entitlement to any unvested options, restricted stock, or other award granted to Executive under SHO&#8217;s 2012 Amended and Restated Stock Plan or other stock plan sponsored by SHO will be determined in accordance with the terms and conditions of the applicable award agreement and the stock plan document regarding termination of
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage101"></A>
<A NAME="EXH1027SEVERANCEAGREEMENT_HTM_SBD25BE0FB92C44BBB2111F13CF9B8DCA">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	employment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:36PX;">
	v.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Post-Termination Forfeiture of Severance Benefits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	. If SHO determines after the Date of Termination that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3D3D3D;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	engaged in activity during employment with SHO that SHO determines constituted Cause, Executive will immediately cease to be eligible for Severance Benefits and will be required to reimburse SHO for any portion of Severance Benefits received by Executive during the Salary Continuation Period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Definitions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	. For purposes of this Agreement, each capitalized term herein is either defined in the section, exhibit, or Appendix in which it first appears or in this Section 2. The following capitalized terms will have the definitions as set forth below:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:53PX;TEXT-INDENT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3D3D3D;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3D3D3D;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Cause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3D3D3D;">
	&#8221;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	means (i) a material breach by Executive (other than a breach resulting from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3D3D3D;">
	Executive&#8217;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	incapacity due to a Disability) of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3D3D3D;">
	Executive&#8217;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	duties and responsibilities to SHO, including under an offer letter or comparable document (if any, together the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Offer Letter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	&#8221;), which breach is demonstrably willful and deliberate on Executive&#8217;s part, is committed in bad faith or without reasonable belief that such breach is in the best interests of SHO, and is not remedied in a reasonable period of time after receipt of written notice from SHO specifying such breach; (ii) Executive&#8217;s conviction of a felony involving moral turpitude;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3D3D3D;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	(iii) Executive&#8217;s dishonesty or willful misconduct in connection with Executive&#8217;s employment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Disability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	&#8221; means disability as defined under the SHO long-term disability plan in effect as of the date of execution of this Agreement (regardless of whether Executive is a participant under such plan).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Good Reason
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	&#8221; means, without Executive&#8217;s written consent, (i) a reduction of more than ten percent (10%) in the sum of Executive&#8217;s annual base salary and target annual incentive under the AIP from those in effect as of the date of this Agreement; (ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#242424;">
	Executive&#8217;s mandatory relocation to an office more than fifty (50) miles from the primary location at which Executive is required to perform Executive&#8217;s duties immediately prior to the date of this Agreement; or (iii) any other action or inaction that constitutes a material breach of the terms of Executive&#8217;s employment with SHO, including under the Offer Letter, by SHO or its successor, including failure of a successor company to assume or fulfill the obligations under this Agreement. In each case, Executive must provide SHO with written notice of the facts giving rise to a claim that Good Reason exists for purposes of this Agreement within thirty (30) days of the initial existence of such Good Reason event, and SHO will have a right to remedy such event within sixty (60) days after receipt of Executive&#8217;s written notice (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#242424;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Sixty (60)-Day Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#242424;">
	&#8221;). If SHO remedies the Good Reason event within the Sixty (60)-Day Period, the Good Reason event (and Executive&#8217;s right to receive any benefit under this Agreement on account of termination of employment for Good Reason) will cease to exist. If SHO does not remedy the Good Reason event within the Sixty (60)-Day Period, and Executive does not incur a termination of employment within thirty (30) days following the earlier of: (y) the date SHO notifies Executive that it does not intend to remedy the Good Reason or does not agree that there has been a Good Reason event, or (z) the date on which the Sixty (60)-Day Period expires, the Good Reason event (or any claim of Good Reason) will cease to exist. Notwithstanding the foregoing, if Executive fails to provide written notice to SHO of the facts giving rise to a claim of Good Reason within thirty (30) days of the initial existence of such Good Reason event, the Good Reason event (and Executive&#8217;s right to receive any benefit under this Agreement on account of termination of employment for Good Reason) will cease to exist as of the thirty-first (31st) day following the later of its occurrence or Executive&#8217;s knowledge thereof.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	If Executive terminates Executive&#8217;s employment under clause (i) of this definition, Executive&#8217;s annual base salary rate for purposes of Section 1 hereof will be Executive&#8217;s annual base salary rate in effect prior to the reduction that triggered the applicability of such Good Reason event.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	d.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	SHO Affiliate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; means any person with whom SHO is considered to be a single employer under Section 414 (b) of the Internal Revenue Code (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Code
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) and all persons with whom SHO would be considered a single employer under Code Section 414 (c), substituting &#8220;50%&#8221; for the &#8220;80%&#8221; standard
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage102"></A>
<A NAME="EXH1027SEVERANCEAGREEMENT_HTM_SBD25BE0FB92C44BBB2111F13CF9B8DCA">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	that would otherwise apply.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	e.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#242424;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#242424;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 409A Threshold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#242424;">
	&#8221; means an amount equal to two (2) times the lesser of (i) Executive&#8217;s base salary for services provided to SHO as an employee for the calendar year preceding the calendar year in which Executive has a Separation from Service; or (ii) the maximum amount that may be taken into account under a qualified plan in accordance with Code Section 40l (a)(17) for the calendar year in which Executive has a Separation from Service. In all events, this amount will be limited to the amount specified under Treasury Regulation Section 1.409A-1(b)(9)(iii)(A) or any successor thereto.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	f.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#242424;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#242424;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Separation from Service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#242424;">
	&#8221; means a &#8220;Separation from Service&#8221; from SHO within the meaning of Code Section 409A (and regulations issued thereunder). Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, the fact that Executive is treated as having incurred a Separation from Service under Code Section 409A and the terms of this Agreement will not be determinative, or in any way affect the analysis, of whether Executive has retired, terminated employment, separated from service, incurred a severance from employment or become entitled to a distribution, under the terms of any retirement plan (including pension plans and 401(k) savings plans) maintained by SHO.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	g.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Specified Employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;">
	&#8221; has the meaning set forth under Code Section 409A (and regulations issued thereunder).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Intellectual Property Rights
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;">
	. Executive acknowledges that Executive&#8217;s development work or research on any and all inventions or expressions of ideas that may or may not be eligible for patent, copyright, trademark or trade secret protection, hereafter made or conceived solely or jointly within the scope of employment at SHO, provided such invention or expression of an idea relates to the business of SHO, or relates to actual or demonstrably anticipated research or development of SHO, or results from any work performed by Executive for or on behalf of SHO, are hereby assigned to SHO, including Executive&#8217;s entire rights, title and interest. Executive will promptly disclose such invention or expression of an idea to Executive&#8217;s management and will, upon request, promptly execute a specific written assignment of title to SHO. If Executive currently holds any inventions or expressions of an idea, regardless of whether they were published or filed with the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office or the U.S. Copyright Office, or is under contract to not so assign, Executive will list them on the last page of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Protective Covenants
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;">
	. Executive acknowledges that this Agreement provides for additional consideration beyond what SHO is otherwise obligated to pay to Executive. In consideration of the opportunity to receive the Severance Benefits, and other good and valuable consideration, Executive agrees to the following:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	a.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-Disclosure of SHO Confidential Information
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;">
	. Executive acknowledges and agrees to be bound by the following, whether or not Executive receives any Severance Benefits under this Agreement:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:36PX;">
	i.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-Disclosure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#32;Subject to Section 11,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;">
	Executive will not, during the term of Executive&#8217;s employment with SHO or thereafter, other than in the performance of Executive&#8217;s duties and obligations to SHO, including under the Offer Letter, during Executive&#8217;s employment with SHO, as required by law or legal process, or as SHO may otherwise consent to or direct in writing, reveal, disclose, sell, use, lecture upon or publish any SHO Confidential Information (as defined in Section 4(a)(iii) below) until such time as the information becomes publicly known other than as a result of its disclosure, directly or indirectly, by Executive.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:36PX;">
	ii.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Proprietary Information
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;">
	. Subject to Section 11, Executive understands that if Executive possesses any proprietary information of another person or company as a result of prior employment or otherwise, SHO expects and requires that Executive will honor any and all legal obligations that Executive has to that person or company with respect to proprietary information, and Executive will refrain from any unauthorized use or disclosure of such information.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage103"></A>
<A NAME="EXH1027SEVERANCEAGREEMENT_HTM_SBD25BE0FB92C44BBB2111F13CF9B8DCA">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:36PX;">
	iii.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	SHO Confidential Information
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;">
	. For purposes of this Agreement, &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SHO Confidential Information
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#232323;">
	&#8221; means trade secrets and non-public information which SHO designates as being confidential or which,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	under the circumstances, should be treated as confidential, including any information received in confidence from or developed by SHO, its long and short term goals, vendor and supply agreements, databases, methods, programs, techniques, business information, financial information, marketing and business plans, proprietary software, personnel information and files, client information, pricing, and other information relating to the business of SHO that is not known generally to the public or in the industry.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:36PX;">
	iv.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Return of SHO Property
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	. All documents and other property that relate to the business of SHO are the exclusive property of SHO, even if Executive authored or created them. Executive agrees to return all such documents and tangible property to SHO upon termination of employment or at such earlier time as SHO may request that Executive do so.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:36PX;">
	v.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Conflict of Interest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	. During Executive&#8217;s employment with SHO and during any Salary Continuation Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	(which for purposes of this Section 4(a)(v) will not exceed _________ months)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	, except as may be approved in writing by SHO, neither Executive nor members of Executive&#8217;s immediate family (which will refer to Executive, any spouse, and any child) will have financial investments or other interests or relationships with SHO or any customers, suppliers or competitors which might impair Executive&#8217;s independence of judgment on behalf of SHO. Also during Executive&#8217;s employment with SHO during any Salary Continuation Period, Executive agrees not to engage in any activity in competition with SHO and to avoid any outside activity that could adversely affect the independence and objectivity of Executive&#8217;s judgment, interfere with the timely and effective performance of Executive&#8217;s duties and responsibilities to SHO, or that could otherwise conflict with the best interests of SHO.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	b.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-Solicitation of Employees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	. During Executive&#8217;s employment with SHO and for twelve (12) months following the Date of Termination, whether or not Executive receives any Severance Benefits under this Agreement, Executive will not, directly or indirectly, solicit or encourage any SHO employee to leave the employee&#8217;s employment with SHO, or assist in any way with the hiring of any SHO employee by any future employer or other entity.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	c.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-Competition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	. Executive acknowledges that as a result of Executive&#8217;s position at SHO, Executive has learned or developed, or will learn or develop, SHO Confidential Information and that use or disclosure of SHO Confidential Information is likely to occur if Executive were to render advice or services to any SHO Competitor.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:36PX;">
	i.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	Therefore, for twelve (12) months following the Date of Termination, whether or not Executive receives any Severance Benefits under this Agreement, Executive will not, directly or indirectly, aid, assist, participate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	in, consult with, render services to, accept a position with, become employed by,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	or otherwise enter into any relationship with (other than having a passive ownership interest in or being a customer of) any SHO Competitor.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:144PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:36PX;">
	ii.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	For purposes of this Agreement, &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SHO Competitor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	&#8221; means those companies listed on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Appendix A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	, each of which Executive acknowledges is a SHO Competitor.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	d.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Restriction on Post-Employment Affiliation with SHO Vendors.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	&#32;&#32;Executive acknowledges that as a result of Executive&#8217;s position at SHO, Executive has learned or developed, or will learn or develop, SHO Confidential Information and that use or disclosure of SHO Confidential Information is likely to occur if
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3F3F3F;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	were to render advice or services to any SHO Vendor (as defined herein).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:36PX;">
	i.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	Therefore, for twelve (12) months from the Date of Termination, whether or not
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage104"></A>
<A NAME="EXH1027SEVERANCEAGREEMENT_HTM_SBD25BE0FB92C44BBB2111F13CF9B8DCA">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	Executive receives any Severance Benefits under this Agreement, Executive will not, directly or indirectly, aid, assist, participate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	in, consult with, render services to, accept a position with, become employed by, or otherwise enter into any relationship with (other than having a passive ownership interest in or being a customer of) any SHO Vendor.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:108PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:36PX;">
	ii.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	&#32;&#32;For purposes of this Agreement, &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SHO Vendor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	&#8221; means, the vendors, if any, listed in Appendix A as well as any other vendor with combined annual gross sales of services or merchandise to SHO in excess of $200 million.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	e.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Compliance with Protective Covenants
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	. Executive will provide SHO with such information as SHO may from time to time reasonably request to determine Executive&#8217;s compliance with this Section 4. Executive authorizes SHO to contact Executive&#8217;s future employers and other entities with which Executive has any business relationship to determine Executive&#8217;s compliance with this Agreement or to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	communicate the contents of this Agreement to such employers and entities. Executive releases SHO, their agents and employees, from all liability for any damage arising from any such contacts or communications.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	f.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Necessity and Reasonableness
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	. Executive agrees that the restrictions set forth herein are necessary to prevent the use and disclosure of SHO Confidential Information and to otherwise protect the legitimate business interests of SHO. Executive further agrees and acknowledges that the provisions of this Agreement are reasonable.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	g.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	General Release and Waiver
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	. In connection with Executive&#8217;s termination of employment with SHO (whether initiated by SHO or Executive in accordance with Section (1)(a) above), Executive will execute a binding general release and waiver of claims in a form to be provided by SHO (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	General Release and Waiver
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	&#8221;), which is incorporated by reference in this Agreement. The General Release and Waiver will be in a form substantially similar to the form attached as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Appendix B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	&#32;to this Agreement. If the General Release and Waiver is not signed within the time articulated therein, or is signed but subsequently revoked, Executive will cease to be entitled to receive Severance Benefits and will be obligated to reimburse SHO for the portion, if any, of the Severance Benefits already paid to Executive by SHO in its sole discretion prior to the expiration of the Revocation Period.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	h.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exception Request
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Executive may request a waiver or a specific exception to the non-competition provisions of this Agreement by written request to the Vice President of Human Resources or Vice President, General Counsel (or the equivalent) of SHO. Such a request will be given reasonable consideration and may be granted, in whole or in part, or denied by SHO in its absolute discretion.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Irreparable Harm
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#262626;">
	. Executive acknowledges that irreparable harm would result from any breach by Executive of the provisions of this Agreement, including Sections 4(a), 4(b), 4(c) and 4(d), and that monetary damages alone would not provide adequate relief for any such breach. Accordingly, if Executive breaches or threatens to breach this Agreement, Executive consents to injunctive relief in favor of SHO without the necessity of SHO posting a bond. Moreover, any award of injunctive relief will not preclude SHO from seeking or recovering any lawful compensatory damages on account of any harm which result from a breach
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	of this Agreement, including a forfeiture of any future payments otherwise due hereunder, and a return of any payments and benefits already received by Executive under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-Disparagement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	. Subject to Section 11, Executive will not take any actions that would reasonably be expected to be detrimental to the interests of SHO nor make derogatory statements, either written or oral to any third party, or otherwise publicly disparage SHO or its products, services, or present or former employees, officers or directors, and will not authorize others to make such derogatory or disparaging statements on Executive&#8217;s behalf. This provision does not, and is not intended to, preclude Executive from entering into any relationship with a SHO Competitor or SHO Vendor if such relationship is permissible under Section 4(c) or 4(d) and does not, and is not intended to, preclude Executive from providing truthful
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage105"></A>
<A NAME="EXH1027SEVERANCEAGREEMENT_HTM_SBD25BE0FB92C44BBB2111F13CF9B8DCA">
</A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	testimony in response to legal process or governmental inquiry.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Cooperation.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	&#32;&#32;Executive agrees, without receiving additional compensation, to fully and completely cooperate with SHO both during and after the period of employment with SHO (including any Salary Continuation Period), with respect to matters that relate to such period of employment, in all investigations, potential litigation or litigation in which SHO is involved or may become involved other than any such investigations, potential litigation or litigation between SHO and Executive. SHO will reimburse Executive for reasonable travel and out-of-pocket expenses incurred in connection with any such investigations, potential litigation or litigation, except in the case of litigation between SHO and Executive.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Future Enforcement or Remedy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	. Any waiver, or failure to seek enforcement or remedy for any breach or suspected breach of any provision of this Agreement by SHO or Executive in any instance will not be deemed a waiver of such provision in the future.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Acting as Witness
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	. Subject to Section 11, Executive agrees that both during and after the period of employment with SHO (including any Salary Continuation Period), Executive will not voluntarily act as a witness, consultant or expert for any person or party in any action against or involving SHO unless subject to judicial enforcement to appear as a fact witness only.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Breach by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3F3F3F;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3F3F3F;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	In the event of a breach by Executive of any of the provisions of this Agreement, including the non-competition provisions (Section 4) and the non-disparagement provision (Section 6) of this Agreement, the obligation of SHO to pay Salary Continuation Amount or to provide other Severance Benefits under this Agreement will immediately cease and any Salary Continuation Amount payments already received and the value of any other Severance Benefits already received will be returned by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3F3F3F;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	to SHO. Further, Executive agrees that SHO will be entitled to recovery of its attorneys&#8217; fees and other associated costs incurred as a result of any attempt to redress a breach by Executive or to enforce its rights and protect its interests under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	11.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	No Prohibition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Subject to the next sentence, nothing in this Agreement will be construed to prohibit Executive from filing a charge with, reporting possible violations to, or participating or cooperating with any governmental agency or entity, including the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission, the Department of Justice, the Securities and Exchange Commission, Congress, or any agency Inspector General, or making other disclosures that are protected under the whistleblower, anti-discrimination, or anti-retaliation provisions of federal, state, or local law or regulation. Executive may not disclose SHO Confidential Information that is protected by the attorney-client privilege except as expressly authorized by law. Executive does not need the prior authorization of SHO to make any such reports or disclosures, and Executive is not required to notify SHO that Executive has made such reports or disclosures.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Severability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	. If any provision or provisions of this Agreement is found invalid, illegal, or unenforceable, in whole or in part, then such provision or provisions will be modified or restricted so as to effectuate as nearly as possible in a valid and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3F3F3F;">
	enforceable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	way the provisions hereof, or will be deemed excised from this Agreement, as the case may require, and this Agreement will be construed and enforced to the maximum extent permitted by law, as if such provision or provisions had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	been originally incorporated herein as so modified or restricted or as if such provision or provisions had not been originally incorporated herein, as the case may be.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Employment-at-Will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	. This Agreement does not constitute a contract of employment, and Executive acknowledges that Executive&#8217;s employment with SHO is terminable &#8220;at-will&#8221; by either party at any time with or without cause and with or without notice.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

	14.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Other Plans, Programs, Policies and Practices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	. If any provision of this Agreement conflicts with any other plan, programs, policy, practice or other SHO document, then the provisions of this Agreement will control, except as otherwise precluded by law. Executive will not be eligible for any benefits under
</FONT>

	any transition or severance plan or program maintained by SHO.

	15.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Entire Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. This Agreement, including the appendices hereto, contains and comprises the entire understanding and agreement between Executive and SHO and fully supersedes any and all other prior agreements or understandings between Executive and SHO (including Executive&#8217;s Executive Severance Agreement dated August 2, 2012 between Executive and Sears Holdings Corporation, which had been assigned to, and assumed by, SHO), in each case with respect to the subject matter contained herein, and may be amended only by a writing signed by (a) one of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	Vice President of Human Resources or the Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary (or equivalent) of SHO and (b) Executive.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	. Any compensation paid or provided to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#3D3D3D;">
	Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	under this Agreement will be subject to any applicable federal, state or local income and employment tax withholding requirements.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

	17.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Notices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	. All notices and other communications hereunder will be in writing and will be given by hand delivery to the other parties or by registered or certified mail, return receipt requested, postage prepaid, addressed as follows:
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;TEXT-INDENT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:-2PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	If to Executive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	: At the most recent address on file at SHO.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:48PX;TEXT-INDENT:-2PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	18.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Assignment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	. SHO may assign its rights under this Agreement to any successor in interest, whether by merger, consolidation, sale of assets, or otherwise. This Agreement will be binding whether it is between SHO and Executive or between any successor or assignee of SHO and Executive.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	19.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 409A Compliance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	To the extent that a payment or benefit under this Agreement is subject to Code Section&#160;409A, it is intended that this Agreement as applied to that payment or benefit comply with the requirements of Code Section&#160;409A, and the Agreement will be administered and interpreted consistent with this intent. If the Sixty (60)-Day Period following a Separation from Service begins in one calendar year and ends in a second calendar year (a &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Crossover 60-Day Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) and if there are any payments due Executive under this Agreement that are: (i) conditioned on Executive signing and not revoking a release of claims and (ii) otherwise due to be paid during the portion of the Crossover 60-Day Period that falls within the first year thereof, then such payments will be delayed and paid in a lump sum during the portion of the Crossover 60-Day Period that falls within the second year. Executive&#8217;s right to receive installment payments pursuant to this Agreement will be treated as a right to receive a series of separate and distinct payments.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	20.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Construction and Interpretation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. In this Agreement (1) &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	includes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; and &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; are inclusive and mean, respectively, &#8220;includes without limitation&#8221; and &#8220;including without limitation,&#8221; (2) &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; is disjunctive but not necessarily exclusive, (3) &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; expresses an imperative, an obligation, and a requirement, (4) numbered &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; references refer to sections of this Agreement unless otherwise specified, (5) section&#160;headings are for convenience only and will have no interpretive value, and (6) unless otherwise indicated all references to a number of days will mean calendar (and not business) days and all references to months or years will mean calendar months or years.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	21.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Counterparts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2A2A2A;">
	. This Agreement may be executed in one or more counterparts, which together will constitute a valid and binding agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:48PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:24PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	22.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Right to Jury
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	. Executive agrees to waive any right to a jury trial on any claim contending that this Agreement or the General Release and Waiver is illegal or unenforceable in whole or in part, and Executive agrees to try any claims brought in a court or tribunal without
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	use of a jury or advisory jury. Further, should any claim arising out of Executive&#8217;s employment, termination of employment or Salary Continuation Period (if any) be found by a court or tribunal of competent jurisdiction to not be released by the General Release and Waiver, Executive agrees to try such claim to the court or tribunal without
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

	Governing Law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;COLOR:#2B2B2B;">
	. This Agreement will be governed under the internal laws of the state of Illinois without regard to principles of conflicts of laws. Executive agrees that the state and federal courts located in the state of Illinois will have exclusive jurisdiction in any action, lawsuit or proceeding based on or arising out of this Agreement, and Executive hereby (a) submits to the personal jurisdiction of such courts, (b) consents to the service of process in connection with any action, suit, or proceeding against Executive, and (c) waives any other requirement (whether imposed by statute, rule of court, or otherwise) with respect to personal jurisdiction, venue or service of process.
